author: kareemb
title: Decentralizied Farm to Table
description: Right now Farmers and Collectives are fragmented and too difficult for the average person who wants good healthy local food to navigate.
solution: An autonomous regional Farmer collective. Where standards are enforced, authenticity is ensured, and distribution costs are lowered.
experience: I am a former General Manager of fresh produce distributor. Active in the Regenerative Agriculture space. Entrepreneur, Builder
